subject: RE: Stella Website changes - 1 May

full_threads.body: 1 hour and 45 mins added to Harvest and closed.

Hi Chris,

We’ve gone ahead and published most of the changes we could make in staging.

Can you please refer to this doc <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1JL457qF0VZr9GOQoJfFFPI8wQ6N-AZB6/edit?usp=sharing&ouid=113511673890176901997&rtpof=true&sd=true> for the page update?
Please note we added “Vivian updated” to the changes we updated today, and “Wolf to update” to the remaining ones in the comments.

Let us know if you have any questions. Or you can reply to the comments in the doc.


Many thanks,
Vivian

Vivian Yeung
